Notes.Text:
This update rebuilds missing kernel modules (KMP) to use 'retpolines'
mitigations for Spectre Variant 2 (CVE-2017-5715).

Rebuilt KMP packages:

- cluster-network
- drbd
- gfs2
- iscsitarget
- ocfs2
- ofed
- oracleasm
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirect branch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to an attacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis.
